remarks: Restriction of a product metric.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Sep-2015.)
statement:
resspwsds.y $e |- ( ph -> Y = ( R ^s I ) ) $.
resspwsds.h $e |- ( ph -> H = ( ( R |`s A ) ^s I ) ) $.
resspwsds.b $e |- B = ( Base ` H ) $.
resspwsds.d $e |- D = ( dist ` Y ) $.
resspwsds.e $e |- E = ( dist ` H ) $.
resspwsds.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
resspwsds.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. W ) $.
resspwsds.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. X ) $.
resspwsds $p |- ( ph -> E = ( D |` ( B X. B ) ) ) $.
